import React, { useState } from 'react' import InputLabel from '@material-ui/core/InputLabel' import MenuItem from '@material-ui/core/MenuItem' import FormControl from '@material-ui/core/FormControl' import Select from '@material-ui/core/Select' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import './rekomendasi.scss' const Rekomendasi = () => { const [state, setState] = useState({ categories: '', priceScore: '', spicinessScore: '', saltinessScore: '', sweetnessScore: '', calorieScore: '' }); const [resultData, setResult] = useState({ condition: false, data: [] }); const handleSubmitClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("DATA SCORE:", state) setResult({ condition: true, //data: state }) }; const handleChange = (e ) => { //e.preventDefault(); const {name , value} = e.target //console.log(e.target) setState(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name] : value })) } return (

) } export default Rekomendasi
